name: xcomparison
title: json result file for the structural differences between two binaries

status.description: indication if data gathering was successful

file1.description: path and filename of first file

file2.description: path and filename of second file

newsections.description: name, address and size of sections added in patched file

missingsections.description: names of sections removed compared to original file

thumb-switchpoints.description: list of thumb switchpoints addede to userdata of patched file

newcode.description: start and end address of newly added chunks of code in patched file

items.description: start and end virtual address of new code region (hex)

section-differences.description: list of differences in size or starting address of existing sections

items.description: difference in size or virtual address

vaddr1.description: virtual address of section in original binary

vaddr2.description: virtual address of section in patched binary

size1.description: size (in hex) of section in original binary

size2.description: size (in hex) of section in patched binary

sectionheaderdata.name: sectionheaderdata
sectionheaderdata.title: section header data
sectionheaderdata.description: name, address and size of an ELF section

size.description: size, in bytes, of section (in memory) (in hex)
